references: Amending: Ord 53002. Repealing: Ord 16268, Ord 16712, Ord 20851, Ord 21667, Ord 28890
summary: An ordinance relating to, and regulating the sale of, milk and milk products; providing for the inspection of all persons, or equipment used in, handling the same, and of all premises where the same is produced or solid; defining offenses, prescribing penalties, and amending Ordinance No. 53002, as amended, and repealing Ordinances Nos. 16268, 16712, 20851, 21667 and 28890.
